arStrings.szText: While {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}, you deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.
While {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c}, you deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fire damage every second.
